snippet.title: RPG Fortuna Magus - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2013 KEMCO/WorldWideSoftware

Set out in search of your missing father, and discover the fate of the persecuted magi!
RPG Fortuna Magus, is now available for iPhone/Android!

Get it now on:
App Store
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id818349691?mt=8
Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.wws.magus

Amane and Tia are determined to find their missing father. One day, they encounter a magus who bears the same mysterious mark their father had on his arm. They offer him a room for the night, only to find themselves on the other side of the law for aiding and abetting a known magi...

- Undergo Revelations!
- Earn TP and unleash special attacks!
- Use magestones to raise your element levels
- Hours of enjoyment even after the main story

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
